issue.message: WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE is deprecated (and is not granted) when targeting Android 13+. If you need to write to shared storage, use the `MediaStore.createWriteRequest` intent.
Your app is currently not handling Selected Photos Access introduced in Android 14+
This folder configuration (`v21`) is unnecessary; `minSdkVersion` is 21. Merge all the resources in this folder into `drawable`.
Launcher icons should not fill every pixel of their square region; see the design guide for details
